description: Develop web applications using <primary>ReactJS, TypeScript, and Next.js</primary>, focusing on optimizing <primary>backoffice</primary> systems and <primary>e-commerce</primary> platforms. My role goes beyond development by also providing technical support, resolving incidents promptly, and ensuring the proper operation of production systems.
I combine strong technical skills with high attention to detail, which allows me to enhance user experience and increase operational efficiency in every project I lead.

Led the frontend development of a web application using React.js and TypeScript for a loan management system, working closely with the backend team. Implemented the <primary>loan, investment, extraction, providers, project, pool, profit, payment, reimbursements, and authentication</primary> modules. The system supports two types of users: clients (legal entities) and investors (natural or legal persons), each with distinct permissions and functionalities.

Built the frontend of an admin system using <primary>Forest Admin</primary>, creating custom actions and dynamic forms. This is a project management platform (admin) whose interface I integrated with the API developed by another team member in NestJS.

experiences.companyName: Wholesale Business Group for Goods and Other Consumer Uses
description: Designed and structured the database in PostgreSQL using Doctrine ORM.
Implemented role-based access control to ensure system security.
Developed dynamic forms with custom validations using Symfony Forms.
Automated accounting processes, including monthly closures and financial reporting.
Integrated external libraries for PDF generation and invoice email delivery.
Actively participated in daily meetings and sprint plannings using Scrum methodology.
Optimized SQL queries and Doctrine entities through indexing and performance tuning.
